title: OpenMetadataApplicationConfig
description: OpenMetadata Ingestion Framework definition for Applications, i.e., the YAML shape we require.

workflowConfig.description: General Workflow configuration, such as the OpenMetadata server connection and logging level

raiseOnError.description: Control if we want to flag the workflow as failed if we encounter any processing errors.

successThreshold.title: Success Threshold
successThreshold.description: The percentage of successfully processed records that must be achieved for the pipeline to be considered successful. Otherwise, the pipeline will be marked as failed.

extraHeaders.description: Additional headers to be sent to the API endpoint.

authProvider.description: OpenMetadata Server Authentication Provider. Make sure configure same auth providers as the one configured on OpenMetadata server.

clusterName.description: Cluster name to differentiate OpenMetadata Server instance

hostPort.description: OpenMetadata Server Config. Must include API end point ex: http://localhost:8585/api

verifySSL.description: Flag to verify SSL Certificate for OpenMetadata Server.
verifySSL.title: Verify SSL

oneOf.title: Validate SSL Client Config
oneOf.description: OpenMetadata Client configured to validate SSL certificates.

caCertificate.title: CA Certificate
caCertificate.description: The CA certificate used for SSL validation.

sslCertificate.title: SSL Certificate
sslCertificate.description: The SSL certificate used for client authentication.

sslKey.title: SSL Key
sslKey.description: The private key associated with the SSL certificate.

secretsManagerProvider.description: Secrets Manager Provider for OpenMetadata Server.
secretsManagerProvider.title: Secrets Manager Provider

secretsManagerLoader.description: Secrets Manager Loader for the Pipeline Service Client.
secretsManagerLoader.title: Secrets Manager Client Loader

apiVersion.description: OpenMetadata server API version to use.

limitRecords.description: Limit the number of records for Indexing.

forceEntityOverwriting.description: Force the overwriting of any entity during the ingestion.

storeServiceConnection.description: If set to true, when creating a service during the ingestion we will store its Service Connection. Otherwise, the ingestion will create a bare service without connection details.

elasticsSearch.description: Configuration for Sink Component in the OpenMetadata Ingestion Framework.

type.description: Type of sink component ex: metadata

schemaFilterPattern.title: Default Schema Filter Pattern
schemaFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude schemas that matches the pattern.

tableFilterPattern.title: Default Table Filter Pattern
tableFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude tables that matches the pattern.

includes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and include only database entities that match.

excludes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and exclude only database entities that match.

databaseFilterPattern.title: Default Database Filter Pattern
databaseFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude databases that matches the pattern.

supportsDataInsightExtraction.description: Flag to enable Data Insight Extraction

supportsElasticSearchReindexingExtractio.description: Flag to enable ElasticSearch Reindexing Extraction

config.description: key/value pairs to pass to workflow component.

sourcePythonClass.description: Source Python Class Name to run the application

oneOf.title: CollateAIAppConfig
oneOf.description: Configuration for the CollateAI External Application.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Query filter to be passed to ES. E.g., `{"query":{"bool":{"must":[{"bool":{"should":[{"term":{"domains.displayName.keyword":"DG Anim"}}]}}]}}}`. This is the same payload as in the Explore page.

patchIfEmpty.title: Patch Description If Empty
patchIfEmpty.description: Patch the description if it is empty, instead of raising a suggestion

oneOf.title: AutomatorAppConfig
oneOf.description: Configuration for the Automator External Application.

resource.description: Entities selected to run the automation.

queryFilter.description: Query filter to be passed to ES. E.g., `{"query":{"bool":{"must":[{"bool":{"should":[{"term":{"domains.displayName.keyword":"DG Anim"}}]}}]}}}`. This is the same payload as in the Explore page.

filterJsonTree.description: Filter JSON tree to be used for rendering the filters in the UI. This comes from Immutable Tree type of react-awesome-query-builder.

action.description: Action to take on those entities. E.g., propagate description through lineage, auto tagging, etc.

oneOf.title: AddTagsAction
oneOf.description: Apply Classification Tags to the selected assets.

tags.description: Classification Tags to apply (source must be 'Classification')

items.title: TagLabel
items.description: This schema defines the type for labeling an entity with a Tag.

name.description: Name of the tag or glossary term.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this tag.

style.description: UI Style is used to associate a color code and/or icon to entity to customize the look of that entity in UI.

color.description: Hex Color Code to mark an entity such as GlossaryTerm, Tag, Domain or Data Product.

iconURL.description: An icon to associate with GlossaryTerm, Tag, Domain or Data Product.

coverImage.description: Cover image configuration for the entity.

position.description: Position of the cover image in CSS background-position format. Supports keywords (top, center, bottom) or pixel values (e.g., '20px 30px').

source.description: Label is from Tags or Glossary.

labelType.description: Label type describes how a tag label was applied. 'Manual' indicates the tag label was applied by a person. 'Derived' indicates a tag label was derived using the associated tag relationship (see Classification.json for more details). 'Propagated` indicates a tag label was propagated from upstream based on lineage. 'Automated' is used when a tool was used to determine the tag label.

state.description: 'Suggested' state is used when a tag label is suggested by users or tools. Owner of the entity must confirm the suggested labels before it is marked as 'Confirmed'.

reason.description: An explanation of why this tag was proposed, specially for autoclassification tags

appliedAt.description: Timestamp when this tag was applied in ISO 8601 format

appliedBy.description: Who it is that applied this tag (e.g: a bot, AI or a human)

applyToChildren.title: Apply to Children
applyToChildren.description: Apply tags to the children of the selected assets that match the criteria. E.g., columns, tasks, topic fields,...

overwriteMetadata.title: Overwrite Metadata
overwriteMetadata.description: Update tags even if they are already defined in the asset. By default, incoming tags are merged with the existing ones.

oneOf.title: RemoveTagsAction
oneOf.description: Remove Classification Tags Action Type

labelType.description: Remove tags by its label type

tags.description: Classification Tags to remove (source must be 'Classification')

labels.description: Remove tags by its label type

applyToChildren.title: Apply to Children
applyToChildren.description: Remove tags from the children of the selected assets. E.g., columns, tasks, topic fields,...

applyToAll.title: Apply to All
applyToAll.description: Remove tags from all the children and parent of the selected assets.

oneOf.title: AddTermsAction
oneOf.description: Apply Glossary Terms to the selected assets.

applyToChildren.title: Apply to Children
applyToChildren.description: Apply terms to the children of the selected assets that match the criteria. E.g., columns, tasks, topic fields,...

overwriteMetadata.title: Overwrite Metadata
overwriteMetadata.description: Update terms even if they are already defined in the asset. By default, incoming terms are merged with the existing ones.

oneOf.title: RemoveTermsAction
oneOf.description: Remove Glossary Terms Action Type

labelType.description: Remove terms by its label type

labels.description: Remove terms by its label type

applyToChildren.title: Apply to Children
applyToChildren.description: Remove terms from the children of the selected assets. E.g., columns, tasks, topic fields,...

applyToAll.title: Apply to All
applyToAll.description: Remove terms from all the children and parent of the selected assets.

oneOf.title: AddDomainAction
oneOf.description: Add domains to the selected assets.

overwriteMetadata.title: Overwrite Metadata
overwriteMetadata.description: Update the domains even if they are defined in the asset. By default, we will only apply the domains to assets without domains.

oneOf.title: RemoveDomainAction
oneOf.description: Remove domains from the selected assets.

oneOf.title: AddDescriptionAction
oneOf.description: Apply Tags to the selected assets.

applyToChildren.title: Apply to Children
applyToChildren.description: Apply the description to the children of the selected assets that match the criteria. E.g., columns, tasks, topic fields,...

overwriteMetadata.title: Overwrite Metadata
overwriteMetadata.description: Update the description even if they are already defined in the asset. By default, we'll only add the descriptions to assets without the description set.

oneOf.title: AddCustomPropertiesAction
oneOf.description: Add a Custom Property to the selected assets.

overwriteMetadata.title: Overwrite Metadata
overwriteMetadata.description: Update the Custom Property even if it is defined in the asset. By default, we will only apply the owners to assets without the given Custom Property informed.

oneOf.title: RemoveDescriptionAction
oneOf.description: Remove Owner Action Type

applyToChildren.title: Apply to Children
applyToChildren.description: Remove descriptions from the children of the selected assets. E.g., columns, tasks, topic fields,...

applyToAll.title: Apply to All
applyToAll.description: Remove descriptions from all the children and parent of the selected assets.

oneOf.title: AddTierAction
oneOf.description: Add an owner to the selected assets.

overwriteMetadata.title: Overwrite Metadata
overwriteMetadata.description: Update the tier even if it is defined in the asset. By default, we will only apply the tier to assets without tier.

oneOf.title: RemoveTierAction
oneOf.description: Remove Owner Action Type

oneOf.title: AddTestCaseAction
oneOf.description: Add Test Cases to the selected assets.

testCaseDefinitions.description: Minimum set of requirements to get a Test Case request ready

testDefinition.description: Fully qualified name of the test definition.

items.description: This schema defines the parameter values that can be passed for a Test Case.

name.description: name of the parameter. Must match the parameter names in testCaseParameterDefinition

value.description: value to be passed for the Parameters. These are input from Users. We capture this in string and convert during the runtime.

computePassedFailedRowCount.description: Compute the passed and failed row count for the test case.

useDynamicAssertion.description: If the test definition supports it, use dynamic assertion to evaluate the test case.

applyToChildren.title: Apply to Children
applyToChildren.description: Add tests to the selected table columns

overwriteMetadata.title: Overwrite Metadata
overwriteMetadata.description: Update the test even if it is defined in the asset. By default, we will only apply the test to assets without the existing test already existing.

oneOf.title: RemoveTestCaseAction
oneOf.description: Remove Test Cases Action Type

items.description: A unique name that identifies an entity. Example for table 'DatabaseService.Database.Schema.Table'.

applyToChildren.title: Apply to Children
applyToChildren.description: Remove tests to the selected table columns

oneOf.title: AddOwnerAction
oneOf.description: Add owners to the selected assets.

overwriteMetadata.title: Overwrite Metadata
overwriteMetadata.description: Update the owners even if it is defined in the asset. By default, we will only apply the owners to assets without owner.

oneOf.title: RemoveOwnerAction
oneOf.description: Remove Owner Action Type

oneOf.title: RemoveCustomPropertiesAction
oneOf.description: Remove Custom Properties Action Type

oneOf.title: AddDataProductAction
oneOf.description: Add a Data Product to the selected assets.

items.title: Entity Reference
items.description: This schema defines the EntityReference type used for referencing an entity. EntityReference is used for capturing relationships from one entity to another. For example, a table has an attribute called database of type EntityReference that captures the relationship of a table `belongs to a` database.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies an entity instance.

fullyQualifiedName.description: Fully qualified name of the entity instance. For entities such as tables, databases fullyQualifiedName is returned in this field. For entities that don't have name hierarchy such as `user` and `team` this will be same as the `name` field.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this entity.

deleted.description: If true the entity referred to has been soft-deleted.

inherited.description: If true the relationship indicated by this entity reference is inherited from the parent entity.

overwriteMetadata.title: Overwrite Metadata
overwriteMetadata.description: Update the Data Product even if the asset belongs to a different Domain. By default, we will only add the Data Product if the asset has no Domain, or it belongs to the same domain as the Data Product.

oneOf.title: RemoveDataProductAction
oneOf.description: Remove a Data Product to the selected assets.

oneOf.title: LineagePropagationAction
oneOf.description: Propagate description, tags and glossary terms via lineage

propagateDomains.title: Propagate Domains
propagateDomains.description: Propagate domains from the parent through lineage

propagateColumnLevel.title: Propagate Column Level
propagateColumnLevel.description: Propagate the metadata to columns via column-level lineage.

propagateParent.title: Propagate Parent
propagateParent.description: Propagate the metadata to the parents (e.g., tables) via lineage.

overwriteMetadata.title: Overwrite Metadata
overwriteMetadata.description: Update descriptions, tags and Glossary Terms via lineage even if they are already defined in the asset. By default, descriptions are only updated if they are not already defined in the asset, and incoming tags are merged with the existing ones.

propagationDepth.title: Propagation Depth
propagationDepth.description: Number of levels to propagate lineage. If not set, it will propagate to all levels.

propagationDepthMode.title: Propagation Depth Mode
propagationDepthMode.description: Mode for calculating propagation depth. 'ROOT' calculates depth from root nodes (sources with no parents). 'DATA_ASSET' calculates depth relative to each data asset being processed, ensuring each asset only receives metadata from nodes within the specified number of hops upstream.

propagationStopConfigs.title: Propagation Stop Configurations
propagationStopConfigs.description: List of configurations to stop propagation based on conditions

items.title: PropagationStopConfig
items.description: Configuration to stop lineage propagation based on conditions

metadataAttribute.title: Metadata Attribute
metadataAttribute.description: The metadata attribute to check for stopping propagation

value.title: Stop Values
value.description: List of attribute values that will stop propagation when any of them is matched

useOptimizedPropagation.title: Use Optimized Propagation
useOptimizedPropagation.description: Use the optimized propagation algorithm that reduces memory usage and API calls. Recommended for large lineage graphs. If set to false, uses the original propagation algorithm. Default is true.

oneOf.title: MLTaggingAction
oneOf.description: ML Tagging action configuration for external automator.

resources.description: Entities selected to run the automation.

actions.description: Action to take on those entities. E.g., propagate description through lineage, auto tagging, etc.

oneOf.title: SlackAppConfiguration
oneOf.description: This schema defines the Slack App Information

signingSecret.description: Signing Secret of the Application. Confirm that each request comes from Slack by verifying its unique signature.

oneOf.title: CollateAIQualityAgentAppConfig.json
oneOf.description: Configuration for the Collate AI Quality Agent.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Query filter to be passed to ES. E.g., `{"query":{"bool":{"must":[{"bool":{"should":[{"term":{"domains.displayName.keyword":"DG Anim"}}]}}]}}}`. This is the same payload as in the Explore page.

active.title: Active
active.description: Whether the suggested tests should be active or not upon suggestion

oneOf.title: CollateAITierAgentAppConfig.json
oneOf.description: Configuration for the Collate AI Quality Agent.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Query filter to be passed to ES. E.g., `{"query":{"bool":{"must":[{"bool":{"should":[{"term":{"domains.displayName.keyword":"DG Anim"}}]}}]}}}`. This is the same payload as in the Explore page.

patchIfEmpty.title: Patch Tier If Empty
patchIfEmpty.description: Patch the tier if it is empty, instead of raising a suggestion

oneOf.title: DataInsightsAppConfig
oneOf.description: No configuration needed to instantiate the Data Insights Pipeline. The logic is handled in the backend.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Enable Backfill for the configured dates

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: Date from which to start the backfill

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: Date for which the backfill will end

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: If Enabled, Data Asset insights will be populated when the App runs.

retention.title: Data Retention (Days)
retention.description: Defines the number of days the Data Assets Insights information will be kept. After it they will be deleted.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: If Enabled, App Analytics insights will be populated when the App runs.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: If Enabled, Data Quality insights will be populated when the App runs.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: If Enabled, Cost Analysis insights will be populated when the App runs.

batchSize.description: Maximum number of events processed at a time (Default 100).

recreateDataAssetsIndex.title: Recreate DataInsights DataAssets Index
recreateDataAssetsIndex.description: Recreates the DataAssets index on DataInsights. Useful if you changed a Custom Property Type and are facing errors. Bear in mind that recreating the index will delete your DataAssets and a backfill will be needed.

oneOf.title: DataInsightsReportAppConfig
oneOf.description: This schema defines configuration for Data Insights Report Application.

oneOf.title: SearchIndexingApp
oneOf.description: Search Indexing App.

batchSize.description: Maximum number of events sent in a batch (Default 100).

payLoadSize.description: Maximum number of events sent in a batch (Default 100).

producerThreads.title: Number of Producer Threads
producerThreads.description: Number of threads to use for reindexing

consumerThreads.title: Number of Consumer Threads
consumerThreads.description: Number of threads to use for reindexing

maxConcurrentRequests.title: Max Concurrent Requests
maxConcurrentRequests.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests to the search index

maxRetries.title: Max Retries
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retries for a failed request

queueSize.title: Queue Size to use.
queueSize.description: Queue Size to user internally for reindexing.

autoTune.title: Auto Tune
autoTune.description: Enable automatic performance tuning based on cluster capabilities and database entity count

oneOf.title: CacheWarmupApp
oneOf.description: Cache Warmup Application Configuration.

entities.title: Entities
entities.description: List of entity types to warm up in cache. Use 'all' to warm up all entity types.

batchSize.title: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Number of entities to process in each batch.

consumerThreads.title: Consumer Threads
consumerThreads.description: Number of parallel threads for processing entities and warming cache.

queueSize.title: Queue Size
queueSize.description: Internal queue size for entity processing pipeline.

force.title: Force Warmup
force.description: Force cache warmup even if another instance is detected (use with caution).

oneOf.title: Retention Configuration
oneOf.description: Configure retention policies for each entity.

changeEventRetentionPeriod.title: Change Event Retention Period (days)
changeEventRetentionPeriod.description: Enter the retention period for change event records in days (e.g., 7 for one week, 30 for one month).

activityThreadsRetentionPeriod.title: Activity Threads Retention Period (days)
activityThreadsRetentionPeriod.description: Enter the retention period for Activity Threads of type = 'Conversation' records in days (e.g., 30 for one month, 60 for two months).

testCaseResultsRetentionPeriod.title: Test Case Results Retention Period (days)
testCaseResultsRetentionPeriod.description: Enter the retention period for Test Case Results in days (e.g., 30 for one month, 60 for two months).

profileDataRetentionPeriod.title: Profile Data Retention Period (days)
profileDataRetentionPeriod.description: Enter the retention period for Profile Data in days (e.g., 30 for one month, 60 for two months).

auditLogRetentionPeriod.title: Audit Log Retention Period (days)
auditLogRetentionPeriod.description: Enter the retention period for Audit Log entries in days (e.g., 90 for three months).

oneOf.title: AutoPilotAppConfig
oneOf.description: Configuration for the AutoPilot Application.

active.title: Active
active.description: Whether the AutoPilot Workflow should be active or not.

entityLink.title: Service Entity Link
entityLink.description: Service Entity Link for which to trigger the application.

oneOf.title: CollateAIAppPrivateConfig
oneOf.description: Private Configuration for the CollateAI External Application.

collateURL.title: Collate URL
collateURL.description: Collate Server public URL. WAII will use this information to interact with the server. E.g., https://sandbox.getcollate.io

billingCycleStart.title: Cycle Start
billingCycleStart.description: The start of this limit cycle. DEPRECATED: Use central billingCycleStart from LimitsConfiguration in openmetadata.yaml

ingestionPipelineFQN.description: Fully qualified name of ingestion pipeline, used to identify the current ingestion pipeline

pipelineRunId.description: Unique identifier of pipeline run, used to identify the current pipeline run

enableStreamableLogs.description: Enable streaming logs to a remote log storage via the OpenMetadata Server
